ygData.subject: Re: If the game suck?
ygData.msgSnippet: Im here to trade tatics on how to improve how I play and trick s and tip s people find...... This is my best tip so far...If you are in Najena and hunting
ygData.messageBody:
"Im here to trade tatics on how to improve how I play and trick's and tip's
people find......"



This is my best tip so far...If you are in Najena and hunting Tenetacled
Terrors, root them at extream range. You will know you are far enough
becuse you will have a hard time seeing your target. Once rooted, move back
a lil farther and start nuking away. Our casting range is nearly twice
theirs so if root/enstil holds, you wont even get a scratch. This works for
levles 24 and up. If root fails, remeber the way to zone and dont get lost
hehehe
